# aquasec_suppression_rules (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "aquasec_suppression_rules" "all" {}

output "all_rule" {
  value = data.aquasec_suppression_rules.all
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `order_by` (String) Specify the parameter by which to sort the resultsAvailable values : name, -name, created, -created, updated, -updated, enforce, -enforce,description, -description, created_by, -created_by, enforce_date, -enforce_date, enable, -enable,updated_by, -updated_by, policy_type, -policy_type, scope, -scope, application_scopes, -application_scopes
- `page` (Number) Specify the starting page for the results
- `page_size` (Number) Specify the number of results per page

### Read-Only

- `current_page` (Number) The current page number (starting from 1)
- `data` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--data))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `next_page` (Number) The next page number (or zero if not relevant)
- `returned_count` (Number) The number of records returned on the current page
- `selection_scopes` (List of String) The selection scopes applicable to the suppression rules
- `total_count` (Number) The total number of records across all pages
